description:
http://anidb.net/ch64494 [Sakaki Yuuya] is a 14-old-year student who wants to become a professional entertainment duellist to give everyone a smile, but one day, he ends up fighting an exhibition match against the current champion of the Pro Duel World. This fight will lead him to make a decision, and confront the difficulties to make his dream come true.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Swing into action with the dueltainer Yuya Sakaki as he takes center stage in an all-new Action Duel where running, jumping, diving and dueling can make you a champion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Trail of Light: Pendulum Summon!
光の軌跡, ペンデュラム召喚!

REGULAR.description:
With The Sledgehammer set to strike, Yuya uses Pendulum power to swing the duel his way!  Can this phenomenal new summoning method help Yuya hammer the Hammer?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel Saikyou Shinkakei!! Sono Na wa Action Duel
The Strongest Evolution of Dueling!! Its Name Is Action Duel
決闘[デュエル]最強進化系!! その名はアクションデュエル

REGULAR.description:
It could be curtains for Yuya when a rival student cons him out of his Pendulum Cards!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dark Town: The Stolen Pendulum Cards
ダークタウン 奪われたペンデュラム召喚!!

REGULAR.description:
Still shocked by Sylvio’s Pendulum Summon, Yuya must find his focus if he wants to save his friends from a 100-story drop!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Strand of Hope!! Block Spider!
一筋の希望!! ブロックスパイダー

REGULAR.description:
The new kid in town drives Yuya bananas when he begs Yuya to be his duel teacher!  Unfortunately for Yuya, this blue-haired battler won’t give up until Yuya gives in!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Aspiring Apprentice? Shiuin Sora`s Peculiar Pursuit!
Deshiiri Shigan!? Okashi na Okkake "Shiun`in Sora"
弟子入り志願!? おかしなおっかけ「紫雲院素良」

REGULAR.description:
Yuya’s getting schooled by his wannabe student, Sora!  Can Yuya turn things around and teach Sora a lesson about winning, or is Yuya’s Pendulum power not going to make the grade?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mujaki na Omocha Death-Toy Scissor Bear
The Innocent Toy: Death-Toy Scissor Bear
無邪気な融合玩具[おもちゃ] デストーイ・シザー・ベアー

REGULAR.description:
Still steaming from his loss to Yuya, Sylvio looks to get some payback!  But when Zuzu steps in to stop his plans, a mysterious stranger comes out of the shadows to show her how it’s done!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanki no Gekirin Dark Rebellion Xyz Dragon
Imperial Outrage`s Standard of Revolt! Dark Rebellion XYZ Dragon!
反旗の逆鱗ダーク・リベリオン・エクシーズ・ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
The Leo Institute is looking to take over Yuya’s duel school, and they’re bringing 3 of their most dangerous duelists to take down whoever dares stand in their way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Duel School`s Crisis! LDS` Attack
Yuushou Juku no Kiki!! LDS Shuurai
遊勝塾の危機!! LDS襲来

REGULAR.description:
The battle to save Yuya’s duel school goes galactic when Yuya faces off against Leo Institute’s Dipper, an out-of-this-world duelist whose interstellar skills could have Yuya seeing stars!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hoshiboshi no Sabaki! Xyz Tsukai "Shijima Hokuto"
The Judgement of the Stars, XYZ User Shijima Hokuto
星々の裁き! エクシーズ使い「志島北斗」

REGULAR.description:
It’s a gem of a duel when Zuzu faces a fierce Fusion Summoner whose jewel monsters are a cut above the rest!  Can Zuzu and her Divas belt out a victory, or will the Leo Institute’s diamond of a duelist force a final face-off?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiseki no Kishi! Yuugou Tsukai "Koutsu Masumi"
Knights of the Sacred Stones! Fusion User Koutsu Masumi
秘石の騎士! 融合使い「光津真澄[こうつ ますみ]」

REGULAR.description:
It’s all up to Gong to save You Show from falling into the hands of the Leo Institute!  Can Gong stare down defeat without moving his feet, or will a sword-swinging Syncro Summoner slice and dice his way to victory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One with His Sword!! Synchro User Toudou Yaiba
身剣一体!! シンクロ使い「刀堂刃[とうどう やいば]」

REGULAR.description:
It’s a battle under the big top, but no one’s clowning around!  Yuya duels Declan to determine the fate of Yuya’s duel school!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: DDD the King from Another Dimension

REGULAR.description:
Declan has a surprise in store that could swing the duel his way!   Can Yuya take down the best the Leo Institute has to offer, or will Declan’s deck prove to be unbeatable?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Philosophers of Prophecy, Galilei and Kepler!
魔導賢者ガリレイ, ケプラー

REGULAR.description:
Yuya’s down in the dumps, but Principal Boyle’s not having it!  Looking to snap Yuya out of his funk, Skip challenges Yuya to a duel to prove that the show must go on!
Source: crunchyroll

Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance – Sora!  But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aim for the Top Junior Youth Championship!!
目指せジュニアユース選手権!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuya is served a heaping helping of culinary catastrophe when he duels a celebrity chef with a menu full of merciless food monsters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 天才料理人『茂古田未知夫[もこた みちお]』

REGULAR.description:
The table is set for a frenzied food fight to the finish!  Can Yuya handle what Chef Pepper dishes out, or will he lose a lot more than his appetite?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Full Stomach Warning! The Fearsome Guest Entertainment!
豪快披露!! 満腹全席!

REGULAR.description:
It’s a case of mistaken identity when Yuya is eyed as the primary suspect for attacking Leo students!  But when Yuya crosses paths with the real culprit, things go from bad to worse!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre L’Supérieure in a duel of wits!  Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 知識の宇宙!! 九庵堂栄太[きゅうあんどう えいた]

REGULAR.description:
In the finale of the mind-bending match that’s part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya!  Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz who’s never wrong?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 難問!? アタックデュエルクイズ!!

REGULAR.description:
Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ペンデュラムのその先に

REGULAR.description:
Yuya’s future takes a terrifying turn for the worse when he battles a fortunetelling foe who predicts this will be his last duel ever!  Can Yuya fix his fate and avoid a devastating disaster, or has his luck finally run out?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 占い少女 方中[ほうちゅん]ミエル

REGULAR.description:
As Yuya’s battle against the fortunetelling predictress Aura flares to its finish, it becomes crystal clear that Yuya’s danger-filled future is becoming a reality!
Source: crunchyroll

Mysteries are revealed when the masked duelist who’s been terrorizing Leo Institute students is confronted and challenged to a battle royal!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 反逆の翼 レイド・ラプターズ

REGULAR.description:
Yuya needs one more win to get into the Championship, but it will be his most difficult battle yet when he discovers he has to beat his best bud Gong in order to move on!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 不動の覚悟!! 権現坂昇

REGULAR.description:
The battle between best buds Yuya and Gong for a spot in the Arc League Championships rages to a friend-zied finish!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Horizon, Superheavy Koujin Susano-O
Arata na Chihei Choujuu Koujin Susa-no-Ou
新たな地平 超重荒神[ちょうじゅうこうじん]スサノ－O[スサノオー]

REGULAR.description:
Let the games begin! The top duelists from around the globe have gathered together for the Arc League Championships to find out who’s the best duelist in the world!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 開幕!! 舞網チャンピオンシップ

REGULAR.description:
Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head!  Can Allie’s deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アユのエンタメ水族館[アクアリウム]

REGULAR.description:
Zuzu takes center stage in an epic rematch against Leo Institute’s dueling diamond, Julia Krystal!  Will Zuzu avenge her earlier loss and walk away a winner, or will history repeat itself and leave Zuzu singing the blues?
Source: crunchyroll

When Gong’s old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!
Source: crunchyroll

Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down – a deck full of Pendulum Cards!  Could Yuya`s days in the spotlight be done for?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 唸る旋風 妖仙ロスト・トルネード!

REGULAR.description:
Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points!  If Yuya can’t get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 熱戦! エンタメデュエルショー!!

REGULAR.description:
Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Sora’s one man show into a no man show!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 未来都市ハートランド

REGULAR.description:
Sora and Shay`s heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Sora’s sweet-toothed smile?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ketsugou Majuu vs Shinka Suru Hayabusa
The Combining Demonic-Beast VS The Evolving Falcon

REGULAR.description:
While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge!  But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アカデミアとレジスタンス

REGULAR.description:
Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion!  But just when Yuya thinks he’s seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuya can’t believe his eyes when he finds himself standing face-to-face-to-face with two lookalikes who are out to destroy each other… and everything in sight!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuya is in a coma, and nothing has been able to stir him from his terrifying state!  Is Yuya down for the count, or will his duelmate’s ESP and TLC make him A-OK?
Source: crunchyroll

It’s time for the second round of the Arc League Championship!  Yuya is pitted against his polar opposite – a duelist who doesn`t duel to entertain, but rather put his foes into pain!
Source: crunchyroll

When a mysterious visitor threatens to throw the Championship into chaos, Declan moves in to uncover who they are and soon finds himself facing off against a merciless mercenary!
Source: crunchyroll

Declan confronts Celina and shares a story from their past that reveals a frightening future!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Land of Ambition: Duel Academia
野望の地 デュエルアカデミア

REGULAR.description:
It’s time for a nail biting battle royal in the ARC League Championship!  With four battle zones to choose from, the action has never been more mesmerizing or the duels more dangerous!
Source: crunchyroll

While Yuya is looking to knock the competition out cold in the Volcano Zone, the Iceberg Zone is heating up as Zuzu and Gong team up to defrost their foes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 華麗なる留学生『デニス』

REGULAR.description:
As the battle royal rumbles on, Yuya finds himself caught in the crossfire when he stumbles across a battle between not-so-noble Knights!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuya takes on a terrifying trio from Fusion Dimension who turn their victims into cards!
Source: crunchyroll

Outnumbered, outmatched, and out of options, will Yuya tap into a deep-seeded darkness to overcome defeat?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Rebellious Supreme King Black Dragon

REGULAR.description:
Zuzu races to stay one step ahead of a cold-blooded hunter who`s hot on her heels!  Can Zuzu ditch this danger, or will he prove too cunning for her to escape?
Source: crunchyroll

Sparks fly in the Volcano Zone when all our heroes face off against the full fury of Fusion Dimension’s elite Obelisk Force!  With more than life points on the line, the action has never been hotter!
Source: crunchyroll

Are friends now foes as Yuya and Sora go deck to deck in a fiery face-off?
Source: crunchyroll

When Yuya discovers Declan`s web of lies put his friends in danger, he challenges Declan to a battle as payback!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ランサーズ 選ばれた戦士

REGULAR.description:
Yuya’s battle with Declan takes a turn for the worse when Declan’s majestic monsters give Yuya the royal treatment!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanki o Agero Odd-Eyes Rebellion Dragon
Raise the Banner of Revolution: Odd-Eyes Rebellion Dragon
反旗を揚げろ オッドアイズ・リベリオン・ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
It’s a family feud when Yuya takes on his mom in a duel where there’s more to lose than just his allowance!  
Can Yuya avoid being run down by Paradise City’s most feared motorcycle momma?
Source: crunchyroll

The battle between Yuya and his mom kicks into high gear!  Can Yuya avoid being grounded, or will Loco Yoko put the pedal to the metal and throttle her way to victory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Smile World": A Duel Filled with Smiles
笑顔のデュエル「スマイル・ワールド」

REGULAR.description:
As Zuzu and Yugo try to unravel the riddle of Yuya`s dimensional doubles, their sleuthing is cut short by Sector Security!
Source: crunchyroll

Zuzu and Yugo redline their Duel Runner in a high-stakes Turbo Duel with Sector Security!  Can they outrun the long arm of the law, or will Security put the brakes on their escape?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Public Safety Coercion: The Duel Chasers
治安の強制 デュエルチェイサーズ

REGULAR.description:
When Yuya and his pals arrive in the Synchro Dimension, Sector Security is waiting for them with open arms… and cuffs!   Can Yuya smooth things out before Sylvio and Celina put a wrinkle in his plan?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: セキュリティ完全包囲網!!

REGULAR.description:
It’s a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 黒い旋風[せんぷう] クロウ・ホーガン

REGULAR.description:
Dennis and Gong are in for the ride of their lives when they’re introduced to the turbo-charged world of underground motorcycle dueling!
Source: crunchyroll

The battle between Dashin’ Dennis and Sweet Baby Shay hits a speedbump when Sector Security pulls the plug on their Turbo Duel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 地下ライディング・デュエル!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuya learns the ins and outs of The Facility the hard way by coming face-to-face with the toughest and most dangerous duelist in the cell block: the Kingpin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigoku no Sata mo Card Shidai
地獄の沙汰もカード次第

REGULAR.description:
As the people of the prison watch, Yuuya and Tokumatsu Choujirou fight a heated Duel! Tokumatsu presses Yuuya with his "Tokumatsu Victory Combo" which whittles away LP when he draws it, and declares he will win the Duel! Yuuya waits for his chance, trusting in a miracle, and through the Duel, Choujirou`s mindset begins to change?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Man Who Abandoned His Draw!

REGULAR.description:
The inmates` excitement at the revival of "Enjoy Choujirou" continues. Since the Duel between Yuuya and Tokumatsu, the inmates seem energized. Shinji approaches Yuuya with the idea of entering the "Great Entertainment Duel Tournament" held in the prison. The truth is that Crow and Shinji are planning a jailbreak...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 大エンタメデュエル大会!!

REGULAR.description:
As Yuuya and the others head for the outside, the squad chasing them summon Goyou monsters cornering them! They`re trapped with seemingly no way out, then Gonegenzaka and Kurosaki appear!! With perfect teamwork, Yuuya and the others counter-attack. Just as they think they`ve finally escaped, Security chief Rojet appears to block their way...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 捕獲者の王「ゴヨウ・キング」

REGULAR.description:
In order to prove their alliance to the Council, Yuuya and the other Lancers participate in the Friendship Cup at Reiji`s suggestion. On top of which, Yuuya is ordered to participate in an exhibition match on the eve of the tournament where his opponent is King, Jack Atlas...! The crowd`s fevered excitement engulfs the arena where Yuuya is astonished by the force of Jack`s presence. He tries to hold true to his entertainment Dueling, but...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: デュエルキング「ジャック・アトラス」

REGULAR.description:
The duel between Yuuya and Jack has set the people of City`s hearts afire. Meanwhile, Yuuya thinks Jack`s words to him, "your Duels are only about your own satisfaction," might have and what they might have meant. Just then, a boy holding a card appears before Yuuya... And, at the Duel Palace, the participants of the Friendship Cup are introduced...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 打ち砕かれたエンタメ

REGULAR.description:
Yuuya takes the card handed to him by the boy, Sam. Meanwhile, at the Duel Palace, the tournament begins! The first match is Crow`s Black Feathers vs Gongenzaka`s Superheavy Samurai!! Bewildered by his first riding Duel, Gongenzaka glances to the side to find Crow`s Black Bird speeding into a good position. At the same time, Frank and the others, wanting to cheer on Crow, sneak into the arena...!?
Source: crunchyroll

Crow and Gongenzaka`s Duel drove the crowd wild, and through it, they understand each other better. At the same time, Tokumatsu visits Yuuya`s room to tell him what happens to the defeated Duelists in the Friendship Cup... Meanwhile, at the Duel Palace, the next match-up is announced. The names called are Shinji and Tsukikage...! Reiji has a plan, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Duel: Shinji vs Tsukikage. In order to change the class system-based society in the Synchro Dimension, Shinji calls the Commons to action! As if they know how Shinji feels, his monsters attack Tsukikage!! Slowly but surely, Tsukikage is cornered, and Reiji watches to see how the fight will end...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: B・F[ビー・フォース]一斉蜂起

REGULAR.description:
Back on the field for the first time in 10 years, Tokumatsu sends the crowd wild. His opponent? Yuzu! As Yuzu begins her first lightning battle, Yuuya watches her on TV. Through the system, the crowd`s voices reach Tokumatsu, cheering him on. Determined to show Yuuya her best, Yuzu faces down Tokumatsu`s intense attack with everything she`s got.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuzu and Tokumatsu`s fierce exhibition duel light a fire under Yuuya, renewing his emotions and giving him the will to rise again! Meanwhile, at the council hall, Jack Atlas appears before Reiji and Reira! Jack begins speaking quietly of his past...
Source: crunchyroll

Friendship Cup: Day 2! The next competition is Yuuya vs DC (Duel Chaser) 227!! With the bitter aftertaste left from his loss to Jack, Yuuya goes into the exhibition duel wanting to make everyone, including DC227, smile. But DC227 launches relentless, intense attacks, and the crowd is excited by a duel where power means everything, leaving Yuuya feeling unsettled. Just then, on the field, Odd Eyes...!?
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya is depressed after realizing that the Duels he believes in don`t reach the people in this city. Irregardless of his feelings, in the arena, the Duel between Sawatari and Yuugo begins! To counteract the "Troupe from the Underworld" that Sawatari is so proud of, Yuugo summons "Clear Wing" as soon as the Duel starts. Yuuya watches the two battle, and his deck begins to glow...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Slaying the Dragon!! Yugo vs Sawatari
ドラゴン征伐!! ユーゴvs沢渡

REGULAR.description:
After their losses, Gongenzaka, Tokumatsu, and the others have been sent to an underground fighting facility, and Gallagher appears before Sawatari. He explains the rules of the underground facility to Gongenzaka and the others. Meanwhile, Yuuya asks Tsukikage, who had escaped from the underground facility, about Reiji and Reira.
Source: crunchyroll

The battle to finish off the first round of the Friendship Cup is one between two fellow Lancers, Kurosaki vs Dennis! Against Kurosaki, who harbors doubts about Dennis` identity, Dennis puts on an exhibition duel just like any other. But after being cornered by a succession of fierce attacks by Kurosaki, Dennis makes a shocking summons...!!
Source: crunchyroll

In his duel with Kurosaki, Dennis has revealed his own identity! The Lancers are shocked. Kurosaki`s rage and hatred peak. The Duel between Kurosaki and Dennis becomes a battleground in every sense of the word, and inside Yuuya, Yuuto shows an intense reaction...
Source: crunchyroll

The administrative council and Security clash over who should take charge of Dennis who is both a student at the Academy and a serious threat. The council puts a stop to Rojet using his authority to block Security`s movements, but Rojet announces a new plan, the "King`s Gambit." Meanwhile, Dennis has been injured in his duel with Kurosaki, and a certain young man appears before him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キングス・ギャンビット

REGULAR.description:
The second round of the Friendship Cup begins! The first bout is Yuzu vs Sergei! Yuzu charges into battle, intending to show Sergei the terror of a dimensional battle, but Sergei seems almost to be inviting her attacks, taking damage on purpose. Worried for his safety, Yuzu calls a halt to the Duel, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya is driven to distraction worrying over Yuzu`s safety, but the battles are unremitting and he is called to compete against Shinji. He tries to argue against Shinji`s desire to revolt against a world controlled by the Tops, but Shinji`s resentment towards the Tops has changed him and Yuya is cornered by his fierce attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

Trusting that Yuzu is safe because of Sora`s desperate intervention, Yuuya puts all his feelings into his next Draw, trying to turn the match around. What he draws is an "unusable" card, the card he received from Sam, the Tuning Magician! Everyone considers it a mis-draw except Yuuya, who continues to trust the Tuning Magician...!!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya`s won the duel, and Roget approaches him in a friendly manner. Seeing this, Shinji begins to have suspicions about the connection between the Commons, Yuuya, and Roget. Amidst this, after catching a glimpse of Sora in his duel with Shinji, Yuuya goes chasing after him, rushing toward the Duel Palace. Once they`re reunited, the two of them...?!
Source: crunchyroll

Is Crow an enemy, or an ally...? Kurosaki tries to find the answer with a Duel leading to a violent clash with Crow who is raging with the need to avenge his Commons comrades!! An intense aerial battle between their monsters unfolds. At the same time, Roget agrees with Yuuya`s desire to make everyone smile through Duels, and the two agree to help each other`s ideals become reality, but...!?
Source: crunchyroll

The Duel between Kurosaki and Crow grows ever more intense! Crow rides the momentum caused by his revival of his ace card using Phantom Synchro. Kurosaki suddenly calls for the Duel to be suspended! Crow ignores his cries and continues the Duel, but Kurosaki has seen something unthinkable, and...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuukyoku no Hayabusa vs Kurohane no Ikazuchi
The Ultimate Falcon vs the Black-Feathered Thunder
究極の隼vs黒羽の雷[くろはねのいかずち]

REGULAR.description:
Yuzu takes action with Frank, Amanda, and Tanner, but they find themselves surrounded by Security! Without a D-disk to break through, they have no means of resisting... In the midst of this danger, Sora appears before Yuzu!! Connected by strong bonds, the two face down Security!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Bond Between Teacher and Disciple

REGULAR.description:
Amidst the unfolding of Rojet`s schemes, Yuugo and Serena try to start their Duel. Yuugo is unsettled by Serena`s resemblance to his childhood friend Rin, but after taking Serena`s first attack, he dives into the Duel with everything he`s got!! But just as Yuugo is setting up an attack, something strange happens on the highway course. Something feels wrong, but they continue their battle. How will this Duel resolve?!
Source: crunchyroll

Roget`s calculations set Serena on a more advantageous course while Yuugo and Serena continue to exchange fierce attacks. The crowd`s excitement roars even higher! Meanwhile, Yuuya, who has been imprisoned, synchronizes his consciousness with Yuugo`s and Yuugo`s Riding Duel unfolds before his eyes. Together, Yuuya and Yuugo guide the Duel in a new direction...!
Source: crunchyroll

After losing her Duel with Yuugo, Serena is sent to the underground facility. On her way, she is attacked by Security and can`t get away...! As if to save her, Reira appears with a Duel Disk! Though she is scared, Reira resolutely faces down the three Security officers, and, with strong determination in her heart, she shows everyone a Duel unlike any she`s fought before.
Source: crunchyroll

The semifinals of the Friendship Cup are set up in a hurry. The first match is between Yuuya and...Crow?! Crow apologizes for the misunderstanding he had about Yuuya and the Lancers, while Yuuya asks for Crow`s help to rescue his friends. They each vow to help the other achieve his goals, and the Duel begins, but something strange happens to Yuuya...!?
Source: crunchyroll

Simultaneously synchronizing with Yuuto, Yuugo, and Yuuri has had a fiendish effect on Yuuya and he summons the high kind of black dragons, driving Crow into a corner. Sensing something strange, Sora is concerned for Yuuya`s health and seeks Crow`s help! Seeing how strongly Sora feels, Crow throws himself into Duel with no regard for his own safety to save Yuuya. But, just then, the Academy troops arrive at the city...!
Source: crunchyroll

Sora is surprised by the sudden appearance of the Obelisk Force. Roget sends Sergei to intercept them. Meanwhile, the Duel comes to an end. Yuugo and Yuuri return to themselves and face off once more. Reira and Tsukikage are confronted by the Obelisk Force and split up to stand against them, but they are quickly cornered. Just then, who should appear before Tsukikage but Sora from the Academy!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 強襲! オベリスク・フォース

REGULAR.description:
To protect Serena, Reira stands off against the Obelisk Force alone. Just as her strength is about to run out, Yuuya appears! To protect Serena and Reira, Yuuya gets ready to fight in a Duel, but the one the Obelisk Force calls to fight as reinforcements is Barrett...! Barrett is ready to put his life on the line to retrieve Serena. His Duel with Yuuya begins!
Source: crunchyroll

The Obelisk Force`s invasion has trapped Kurosaki, Gongenzaka, and Yuzu in the chaos of the underground facility. Meanwhile, Yuuya fights desperately, but Barrett`s Medals make it a hard fight and the onslaught keeps him cornered. At the same time, Sora confesses how he really feels to Reira and Serena, but while he does, Yuuri sneaks up on them from behind...!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya and Barrett`s fierce battle rages on, and, nearby, Yuugo faces off against Yuuri! When each of Yuuya, Yuuto, Yuugo, and Yuuri`s dragons appear on their fields, something strange happens to Yuuya again!! Meanwhile, Roget is desperate to capture Yuzu as a countermeasure against the Academy. He sends Sergei to find her...!
Source: crunchyroll

After losing Serena, Yuuya loses Yuzu too. He sets out with his friends to rescue them! The uprising of the Commons has cast the city into chaos. As a countermeasure, Roget decides to hold the second round of the semifinals! The lineup for the match is Jack, the King, who receives overwhelming support from the people of the city, and Sergei!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 破滅のデュエルマシン

REGULAR.description:
With the fierce Duel between Jack and Sergei, the chaos of the city quiets. Slowly, Sergei drives Jack into a corner and thrusts a final choice upon him! What is Jack`s heartfelt answer?! Meanwhile, Yuuya and the others head to the security offices to save Yuzu!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Right Arm That Carved Souls

REGULAR.description:
With the conclusion of the Duel, the Commons turn into a mob. Rojet has lost his trump card, and the city once again descends into chaos! Meanwhile, Yuuya finds himself shaken by Yuzu`s desperate wish, and Sam sends him a message. Something entrusted to him by Jack...!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya arrives at the Duel Palace where Jack is waiting for him and shows Jack his resolve! The championship fight, a fierce battle between Yuuya and Jack, unfolds at the Duel Palace. Rojet sends Security and the Commons chase after them...! With the attention of all the people of the city focused on them, the curtain rises on a Duel where Yuuya and Jack fight the kind of Duel they can believe in!!
Source: crunchyroll

As the chaos in the city escalates, Reiji, leader of the Lancers, finally makes his move! At the same time, Jack has wasly brushed aside the Duel Chasers, cornering Yuuya. Yuuya, on the other hand, uses the Duel to confront Jack with his feelings!! The Duel sends their spirits to new heights and a new monster is awakened...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 気高き超魔導剣士[ちょうまどうけんし]

REGULAR.description:
The citizens of the city can`t look away from the intense Duel where Yuuya has managed to summon five monsters at the same time...! Jack powers up his Red Demons and gives everything he`s got to take on Yuuya!! There`s not a moment to catch your breath, the conclusion of the championship match of the Friendship Cup, the Duel between Yuuya and Jack, is about to be settled...! But at the same time, the Council and Roget, each with their own plans, begin to move anew...!
Source: crunchyroll

Reiji and Roget put their pride on the line in a Duel! Reiji manages his DD monsters magnificently, and Roget is driven into a corner by their overwhelming strength. But something strange happens...!! Meanwhile, Yuuya and Jack arrive at the security offices and, along with the Lancers, hurry toward Reiji. Just then, the sound of Roget`s laughter rings out everywhere...!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya arrives in a place he`s never been before... Yuuto and Kurosaki`s hometown, Heartland in the Xyz dimension! Separated from Yuzu once again, Yuuya wanders the desolate city with Gongenzaka and Sawatari. Suddenly, the academy troops appear before them! At the same time, a duelist consumed by hatred wielding a dragon continues the fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 絶望の都ハートランド

REGULAR.description:
Accompanied by a dragon, a duelist faces down his enemies alone... his name is Kaito! Amidst the devastation of Heartland city, Yuuya tries to reason with him, saying that Duels aren`t a tool to be used for conflicts. As if in dismissal, Kaito demands a Duel!! Sawatari gets riled up and Gongenzaka tries to calm him resulting in a three-person Duel. But then Kaito demonstrates his dragon`s overwhelming power...!?
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya stands against Kaito who is consumed by rage!! Yuuya`s feelings fail to reach Kaito`s hardened, closed-off heart and he is cornered by overwhelming strength. Just then, inside Yuuya, Yuuto tells him to summon Dark Rebellion...! What is Yuuto trying to accomplish?! And will Yuuya be able to reach Kaito`s heart through this Duel?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 非情の狩人[かりゅうど]

REGULAR.description:
Yuya hears from Allen and Sayaka that Kaito`s family were turned into cards. Yuya is angry with himself for not being able to understand the sadness in Kaito`s heart, but Allen and the others also bring him clues about his father who disappeared three years ago...! Meanwhile, in the Fusion Dimension, Yuzu is being pursued by the Academy. The girl who appears to save her is...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 華々しき機械天使[きかいてんし]

REGULAR.description:
After being saved by Asuka, Yuzu is lead to a certain place, a small dueling school in the Fusion Dimension - the Yuushou School...! At the same time, while looking for his father, Yuushou, a mysterious boy challenges Yuuya to a duel! The boy harbors a deep hatred for Yuushou, and launches unrelenting attacks against Yuushou`s son, Yuuya...!!
Source: crunchyroll

Kurosaki rushes in to stop Kaito, who is facing down the Academy troops alone, but Kaito shakes off his offer of help, and bares his fangs at him...!! Having failed in his Duel with Yuuya, Kaito`s heart drowns in rage... Kurosaki once felt the same way. Now, to free Kaito`s heart, he stands against him, as though to strike Kaito with his own emotions. What will Kurosaki do...?!
Source: crunchyroll

Reunited with Yuzu at the Yuushou School in the Fusion Dimension, he begins quietly speaking of the events of three years ago. Asuka wants to support Yuushou`s ideals, that Duels should bring happiness, and Yuzu agrees with her. Just then, one of the students appears, wounded by an Academy soldier! That soldier was Yuuri...! The students of the Yuushou School face off against Yuuri who begins to smile an eerie smile!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アークエリア・プロジェクト

REGULAR.description:
Sayaka searches for Kaito who disappeared after his Duel with Kurosaki. Meanwhile, the Taylor sisters, Grace and Gloria, arrive in the Xyz Dimension. The sisters spot Sayaka and immediately begin a duel. With Allen, they start a 2-on-2 tag Duel, but the sister`s overwhelming strength soon has Allen and Sayaka cornered...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決闘[デュエル]に飢えたアマゾネス

REGULAR.description:
Sawatari`s scream suddenly rips through the city...!! When Yuuya and Kurosaki arrive, they find Sawatari and Gonegenzaka collapsed, and the Taylor sisters blocking the way!! Yuuya is enraged by the way the Academy will stop at nothing, hurting his friends, and together with Kurosaki, the two challenge the sisters!! The sisters smile faintly as they force Yuuya and Kurosaki into a corner, and Yuuya faces them down with his entertainment dueling!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アマゾネス・トラップ

REGULAR.description:
Kurosaki`s friends Allen and Sayaka strengthen their bonds with Yuuya and the others. Suddenly, the Obelisk Force appears before them! Yuuya is determined to make it through using his entertainment style, and, moved by his convictions, Kurosaki stands against the Obelisk Force with him. The curtain rises on a duel where the two of them believe in themselves and their friends!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Falcon That Falls on the Battlefield
戦場に果てる隼[はやぶさ]

REGULAR.description:
Yuuya is hurrying to help the wounded Kurosaki when Ed appears before him! Ed believes that strength is the true mark of a Duel, and to prove with his own power that Yuuya and Yuushou are wrong about their "entertainment duels," he commences a Duel. Yuuya is shaken by seeing Ed like that, but, wanting to know his true intentions, he shakes off the inhibitors on Yuuto and throws himself into battle...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 破かれたスマイル・ワールド

REGULAR.description:
Trusting in idea of the power of Duels he inherited from his father, Yuuya faces off against Ed, who denies that power...! Seeing the way Yuuya duels, makes Ed remember the way Yuushou used to duel. All the feelings connected with "Smile World"... Will Yuuya and Ed come to understand each other through their Duel?!
Source: crunchyroll

Through his Duel with Yuuya, Ed has learned the fun of a Duel. After seeing that, Yuuto speaks to his comrades in the Resistance, telling them what he feels is really needed to end this conflict. At the same time, in the Fusion Dimension, Dennis appears at the Yuushou School and sees Yuushou...!!
Source: crunchyroll

When Yuuya and the others arrive in the Fusion Dimension, Academy soldiers appear before them with Dennis in tow! And while he stands there shocked, someone attacks Yuuya... It`s Kachidoki!! Having lost to Yuuya at the Maiami Championship, he`s come to the Fusion Dimension to get his revenge. Yuuya accepts his challenge, hoping that this time he`ll be able to show Kachidoki that Duels should bring smiles, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Yuushou and the others have boarded a ship headed for the Academy, and aboard ship, a Duel between Kaito and Dennis is about to start! The two have each studied under Yuushou. Holding tightly to what they believe, what they must protect, they clash! Yuushou and the others, as well as all the passengers onboard, watch the Duel which leads to a shocking development...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Galaxy Shining in Darkness

REGULAR.description:
The ship that Yuuya and the others boarded at Serena`s direction is a pirate ship! Once they realize it`s a trap, it`s already too late. While they`re still stunned by the sudden turn of events, the captain of the dueling pirates, Solo, launches fierce attacks at them. Just then, they hear a familiar voice...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決闘海賊[デュエルかいぞく]キャプテン・ソロ

REGULAR.description:
Having learned that Rin is imprisoned in an Academy tower, Yuugo races to her aide, but the Guard of the East Tower stands in his way!! At the same time, the Guard of the West Tower appears before Kaito as he races to rescue Ruri...!! Will the two of them be able to save the captured Rin and Ruri?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guardians of the Sun and Moon

REGULAR.description:
Yuugo and Rin rejoice in their long awaited reunion, but even that only lasts for a brief moment. Rin challenges Yuugo to a Duel...!! When they were young, the two of them had fun dueling in the city together. But now, Yuugo senses something wrong with the monsters Rin summons...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiba o Muku Suzu no Ne
The Bell That Triggers the Bite

REGULAR.description:
Yuuya and the others have been taken to an Academy training facility. There waits Sanders, an instructor who directs his students to begin their "special lessons" - a survival Duel where the losers are turned into cards! Yuuya and the others, the Lancers, vs the Academy students. A 5-on-5 Duel with their survival on the line begins...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: サバイバル・デュエル

REGULAR.description:
Ruri is moved to tears by their long awaited reunion, and Kurosaki is overjoyed to find his little sister safe. But, suddenly, Ruri`s attitude changes and she challenges him to a Duel...! Based on information from Ed, Kurosaki realizes that someone must be controlling Ruri. Determined to save his sister himself, he stands against her alone, but when Ruri summons monsters he`s never seen before, Kurosaki is forced to fight a hard battle...!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya and the others are pursued by unseen opponents in a densely wooded Field. These pursuers are the strongest of Sanders` students, the Battle Beasts!! Against the Battle Beasts who attack friend and foe alike, turning them to cards, Yuuya and Gongenzaka combine their forces, but they are soon cornered by attacks fiercer than they ever imagined! Just then, a familiar engine sound rings out over the forest!!
Source: crunchyroll

Replacing the injured Gonenzaka, Jack duels alongside Yuuya! Their well-coordinated tactics begin the counterattack! Seeing the Battle Beasts gradually driven back, Sanders suddenly jumps into the Duel!! Jack and Yuuya trust each other as they fight together, while Sanders and the Battle Beasts use power to control others. How will this tag duel end?!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya and Jack vs Sanders and the Battle Beasts. The Duel continues. Seeing the way Sanders snaps and snarls at the Battle Beasts, Yuuya wants to use the Duel to find the emotions sleeping deep within the Battle Beasts` hearts. The Battle Beasts believe that might makes right in Duels. Will Yuuya and Jack`s tag team be able to change their hearts?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グローリー・オン・ジ・アカデミア!

REGULAR.description:
Yuushou, Reiji, and the others have just come together on the Academy grounds when Yuuri swoops down on them...!! In order to help Yuushou meet the professor, Asuka stands off against Yuuri alone. Yuuri smiles a creepy smile, holding an Honors Student Deck in his hands, a deck only given by the Academy to a chosen few. Asuka wants to show him what she learned from Yuushou, a Duel that brings smiles. The two were both students of the Academy. How will their battle end?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 栄光の機械竜[きかいりゅう]

REGULAR.description:
Racing through the Academy to find Yuzu who`s been kidnapped by Serena, Yuuya runs into Ruri. Inside Yuuya, Yuuto rejoices that Ruri is safe. Just then, a sudden change overtakes Ruri and she challenges Yuuya to a Duel! Yuuto`s strong emotions cause Yuuto`s card to appear from Yuuya`s deck, and to save Ruri, the one who taught him that Duels should bring smiles, Yuuto heads into battle!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 蘇る幻影騎士団[ファントム・ナイツ]

REGULAR.description:
As Yuuya and Yuuto fight to save Ruri, Serena appears before them. Everything is going as the doctor who controls the two of them planned. The power of the Parasite Monster drives Yuuya into a corner, and now something strange is beginning to happen to Yuuya himself...! When two dragons, Odd Eyes and Dark Rebellion, manifest, an Yuuya`s expression looks like that of a demon!!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuri wants to turn Sora into a card, but Yuugo appears and challenges Yuuri to a Duel! The two of them summon their dragons and a fierce battle unfolds. At the same time, Yuushou, Reiji, and the others reach Akaba Reo. Reo begins to tell them of the Demon Duelists who will bring destruction to the world and their four dragons...!! What was the reason for the world being split into four dimensions?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Day the Devil Was Born

REGULAR.description:
The High King Dragon Z-ARC brought about the end of the world. Reo speaks about the day the world was split into four. Once, a girl named Rei stood against Z-ARC in Reo`s place and he says that her feelings are in Reira, but Reiji recognizes it as a scheme his mother, Himika, told him about. When he sees the overwhelming rage Reiji feels over the tragedy, Reo asks for Reiji`s help with Revival Zero...
Source: crunchyroll

Akaba Reo`s goal is to execute Revival Zero and to combine Yuzu and the others, four girls, into one. Hearing this sends Yuuya into a rage, and, together with Raiji who has resolved to part from his father, the two of them challenge Reo to a Duel to crush his ambitions!! Meanwhile, Yuushou anxiously watches over his son even as a strange sense that something is wrong fills his heart...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決戦! 精霊機巧軍[スピリット・テック・フォース]

REGULAR.description:
Yuuya fights against Z-ARC who is trying to consume him, and Reiji stands resolutely against his father, Reo, to stop his plans. Both of their battles rage on. Meanwhile, in another place, Yuuri and Yuugo face off. Four dragons are summoned, one on each field, and, as if to herald the resurrection of the demon, begin to resonate...!!
Source: crunchyroll

Ed and Kaito burst into Yuuri and Yuugo`s Duel! They press hard with D Hero and Light Dragon, but the four person battle only rages harder. Ed, having learned the true joy of a Duel from Yuuya, calls a new monster and attacks with everything he has to save the two of them from the darkness that threatens to swallow them, Z-ARC! In that moment, Yuugo`s heart begins to change...?!
Source: crunchyroll

As Rei`s restoration approaches, Reira tries to convey Rei`s emotions, but Reiji stands in her way!! Reiji hurries to put a stop to Reo`s ambitions, launching a fierce attach with his DD monsters, but he`s startled when Reira overpowers him...!! At the same time, the battle between Yuugo and Yuuri nears its end!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 常闇[とこやみ]に射す光

REGULAR.description:
Having gained immense power, Yuuri smiles eerily and targets Yuuya...! Yuuchou stands in his way. With the feelings of his son held close in his heart, the curtain rises on a fierce battle with Yuuri...!! Will Yuushou`s entertainment Duel be able to stop Yuuri`s rampage...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Greatest Entertainer of the Age
稀代のエンターテイナー

REGULAR.description:
Using his entertainment Duel, Yuushou has pushed Yuuri into a corner. Yuuya struggles desperately to keep from being swallowed by Z-ARC. He sees his father fighting and the pride he feels helps him begin to come back to himself! But the more cornered he is, the more Yuuri smiles...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 輝かしきエンタメショー

REGULAR.description:
The defeat of his father, Yuushou, whips Yuuya`s rage against Yuuri to a fever pitch. Yuuya vs Yuuri. The Duel begins!! Yuuya takes up the card his father left him, Smile World, and faces the battle without fear, but the dragons on the field begin to resonate. In the same moment, the sound spreads through Yuuya`s heart, torturing both Yuuya and Yuuto...!!
Source: crunchyroll

The battle between Yuuya and Yuuri rages on. Meanwhile, Reo manages to activate the Arc Five and the the fusion of the dimensions begins...! Amidst all this, the intensity of Yuuri`s attacks increases, driving Yuuya into a corner, but he fights to the limits of his power for Yuuto, for his friends!! Their battle nears its conclusion...!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya`s Duels will bring peace to the world... Reiji and the others truly believe that, but, right before their eyes, Z-ARC awakens...!! Z-ARC says that their belief in Yuuya is what resurrected him. To stop Z-ARC from using his tremendous power to bring despair to the world, Sora and Ed stand against him, and the Lancers begin a new battle!!
Source: crunchyroll

Sora and Ed stood no chance in their Duel with Z-ARC. Carrying on their fallen comrades` wishes, Kurosaki and Kaito take action! They fight to withstand the terrifying power of Z-ARC`s Supreme King Dragon and throw themselves wholeheartedly into battle to save Yuuto and Yuuya! Will their feelings deliver a miracle?!
Source: crunchyroll

The Duel with Z-ARC rages. Next, Gongenzaka and Jack rise to the challenge! Z-ARC summons Supreme King Dragon Clear Wing, a dragon that resembles Yuugo`s dragon, and the field becomes an even greater danger...! Jack survives by using his own spirit, Red Demons, and, inside Z-ARC, Yuuya begins to try to regain his "entertainer`s spirit"!!
Source: crunchyroll

The next to stand against Z-ARC is Sawatari, and, resurrected from a card, Crow Hogan!! The two use the Duel to call to Yuuya`s emotions, and, for a moment, Z-ARC falters. When he shakes it off and summons Supreme King Dragon Odd Eyes, Akaba Reo appears before him...!!
Source: crunchyroll

In the midst of the fierce battle against Z-ARC, Rei appears to Reo once again, saying that this Z-ARC has a "heart." All the duelists who fought in this Duel feel the same. And, at last, the moment for Reiji to face off against Z-ARC as arrived. Will their feelings for Yuuya deliver a miracle in this fight?!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya aims to become a pro entertainment duelist at the Yuuchou School. Laughter rings out through the school, and peace has returned to the world... An invitation from Akaba Reo arrives for Yuuya. He`s holding a Junior Youth Championship and has invited Yuuya, Gongenzaka, Sawatari, and the others...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ジュニアユース選手権

REGULAR.description:
On Maiami city`s volcano field, a battle royale unfolds between Yuuya, Gongenzaka, Sawatari, and Tsukikage! The all-out battle revolves around Yuuya and Sawatari`s entertainment Duel style. Suddenly, memories of Yuuya`s duel in the Synchro Dimension flood his mind...! What do these memories mean? And what is Reiji`s objective?!
Source: crunchyroll

To bring a smile back to Reira`s face after she`d been sacrificed in the fight to save Yuuya from Z-ARC, and to save Yuzu, who has disappeared, Yuuya stands on the field against Gongenzaka, and begins a new battle!! The two friends have fought their way through many tough battles, and as their Duel unfolds, it leaves the spectators breathless...!
Source: crunchyroll

When Yuuya arrives in the Xyz Dimension, he finds, not Kurosaki, but Dennis! In this dimension where the sadness from the attacks inflicted by the Fusion Dimension refuses to fade, Yuuya and Dennis begin an entertainment Duel to bring smiles back to people`s faces. But the card Dennis takes up is his Ancient Antique Gears! What could Dennis` objective be...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 呪われし機械仮面[ギアマスク]

REGULAR.description:
Arriving in the Fusion Dimension, Yuuya finds Kurosaki confronting Akaba Reo`s out of despair at losing both his little sister and his dear friend. His ferocious rage turns toward Yuuya who was once Z-ARC. Kurosaki is possessed by a steely determination to regain the precious things he has lost. Sadness lights the fire under a fierce battle...!
Source: crunchyroll

After his Duel with Kurosaki ends, Jack appears and stands in Yuuya`s way! Jack declares that, as he is now, Yuuya won`t be able to save anyone. Once more, Yuuya Duels the way he believes is right, but he fears summoning the four dragons, and is quickly driven into a corner! At that moment, in Yuuya`s heart "their" voices...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ディメンション・ハイウェイ

REGULAR.description:
Yuuya vows to use the power of the four dragons to bring smiles to people`s faces. In answer to his feelings, the dragons` attacks begin to drive Jack back! But even after his battle with Jack is over, the spirit of Z-ARC won`t leave Reira, and her smile does not return. Struck by the keen realization that he is still lacking... the opponent Yuuya will face in his final trial is...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 解き放たれたドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
Yuuya is helpless before Reiji`s Super Death King, but Yuuto, Yuugo, and Yuuri give him a push, and he stands against Reiji with everything he`s got!! Neither of them give an inch. Everyone watching the battle, the monsters on the field, and even his opponent Reiji, get swept up in Yuuya`s entertainment Duel...!! A last Duel to bring smiles to everyone`s faces. What waits for Yuuya at the end of it?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Miracle Drawn by the Pendulum
ペンデュラムが描く奇跡
遊戯王 アーク・ファイブ
